  - title: "Machine learning predicts heat capacities of MOFs"
    excerpt: "Chemical engineers at EPFL have developed a machine-learning model that can accurately predict the heat capacity of the versatile metal-organic framework materials. The work shows that the overall energy costs of carbon-capture processes could be much lower than expected."
